Pre-Game Insights: India leads the three-match T20I series 2-0 against Sri Lanka and will look to complete a clean sweep in the final match.
Sri Lanka will be keen to avoid a whitewash and put up a strong performance in the final T20I.
Both teams have talented squads and will be eager to put on a strong performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Pallekele Cricket Stadium is expected to be balanced, offering assistance to both batsmen and bowlers.
Weather in Kandy is expected to be showers in the morning, With a clear and sunny afternoon/evening.
Others: Sri Lanka's batting lineup needs to fire collectively, and their bowlers need to contain the strong Indian batting lineup.
India has shown dominance in the series with their all-round performances.
Key players like Wanindu Hasaranga and Dasun Shanaka from Sri Lanka, and Suryakumar Yadav from India are players to watch.
